MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL11 postcode area of Wrexham affecting properties in Brynteg, Pentre Broughton and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:11AM. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10:30AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 07:50AM on 3rd April 2021
